# PresentationCommand.fadeEnvironment(_:)

**Case**

A value that represents a command that adds fade-in and fade-out effects to backdrop transitions.

## Declaration

```swift
case fadeEnvironment(FadeEnvironmentCommand)
```
title: PresentationCommand.fadeEnvironment(_:)
